page.title: 15TRANSPORT Melton Ross Elsham
page.content: Although this area is now well served by excellent roads, is close to Humberside Airport at Kirmington, and the major Humber port of Immingham, the inhabitants are extremely poorly served by Public transport. The Lin- colnshire Road Car Company limited, a subsidiary of the National Bus Co. is the main bus operator. The 450 route with 4 return journeys daily from Lincoln via Brigg to Hull passes through the Barnetby intersection and along the A15 North.The 850 route be- tween Grimsby and Hull uses the A15 with 3 return journeys daily.But it must be stressed that neither service sets down or picks up in the square. All inhabited houses are between 1 and 3.5 miles from a bus stop.For all intents and purposes either to work or live in this area requires a means of private transport.
